alert.note: Alert for Lafayette; Panola; Tallahatchie; Yalobusha (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 01 at 9:28PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Lafayette, northwestern Yalobusha, northeastern Tallahatchie and southeastern Panola Counties through 945 PM CST... At 928 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Batesville, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Batesville, Water Valley, George Payne State Park, Pope, Burgess, Enid, Courtland, Shuford, Asa, Eureka Springs and Chapeltown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CST for northwestern Mississippi.
